update t_car
car_name = #{carName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_price = #{carPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
car_order = #{carOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_state = #{carState,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.select:
SELECT c.id,c.car_name,c.car_order,c.car_price,c.description,c.assign_time,c.rent_time,c.return_time FROM t_car c join t_user_car t on t.car_id =c.id
c.is_valid = 1 and t.user_id =#{userId}
and c.car_name like concat('%',#{query.carName},'%')
and c.car_order like concat('%',#{query.carOrder},'%')
